channel.title: Mangopay docs - Release notes
channel.description: Stay up to date with Mangopay's latest product releases

item.title: API - Aug 9, 2024 - Qottab
item.description: ADDED - Quoted and Instant Conversions now available for Client Wallet; CHANGED - CreditedFunds Amount can be sent on quotes

item.title: API - Aug 1, 2024 - Natron
item.description: ADDED - CardHolderName can be added to existing Card objects; CHANGED - CardHolderName accepts special characters

item.title: API - Jul 17, 2024 - Argyle
item.description: ADDED - Statement descriptor available on BACS Direct Debit
